body.name: Emerita by Life-flo pH Balancing Feminine Wash, Hydrating Cleanser Soothes Delicate Areas, Fights Odor and Keeps You Feeling Fresh, Made Without Parabens, Fragrance Free, Not Tested on Animals, 4oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 38 mins
features: Daily Feminine Care – The mild, hydrating intimate wash women depend on, this balancing cleanser supports vaginal health and proper pH levels, alleviates dryness and calms sensitive areas.
Essentials for Women – Especially formulated for your most delicate skin, our feminine wash cleanses gently, fights odor and keeps you feeling fresh.
Soothing Moisture – Designed for external use only, ultra-mild liquid formula hydrates vaginal skin and helps soothe problem areas with organic aloe vera, chamomile and calendula extracts.
Trusted Quality – A leading brand of wellness products for women, Emerita by Life-flo offers a large selection of feminine hygiene products formulated with your health and comfort in mind.

The Life-flo Difference – Fragrance free, made without parabens and lab tested in our state-of-the-art facility in Utah to ensure the purity and quality of its ingredients, pH Balancing Wash comes with a 60-day money back guarantee and is not tested on animals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This Product Personal Moisturizer DHEA Balancing Cream Magnesium Cooling Gel Cooling Mist Benefits Cleanses, refreshes & balances delicate skin; supports pH levels Water-based moisturizer soothes, balances & help alleviate dryness Designed to support a woman’s balance at midlife Refreshes & cools warm, flushed skin, hydrates & balances Refreshes & cools warm, flushed skin, calms & balances the senses Product Size 4 OZ 2 OZ 4 OZ 3.4 OZ 3.4 FL OZ Key Ingredients Ginseng, Organic Aloe Vera, Chamomile & Calendula Aloe Vera, Vitamin E, Calendula & Ginseng 15 mg DHEA per application, cream base with Vitamin E, Aloe Vera & Safflower Oil Magnesium Chloride, Dimethyl Sulfone (MSM), Organic Aloe Vera, Ginger, Organic Orange Oil & Peppermint Organic Aloe Vera, Organic Orange Oil, Ginger, Peppermint, Organic Bergamot & Clary Sage Life-flo Quality Made without parabens, not tested on animals, GMP facility Fragrance-free, made without parabens Made without parabens, fragrance-free, not tested on animals Not tested on animals, GMP facility Not tested on animals, GMP facility

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best feminine wash EVER!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love how well this cleans. Makes skin feel super soft and doesn't make you feel dry after use. The only bad part was that it came in a small bottle, but you don't need much. I've had my 4 oz bottle for about 2-3 months now and I'm just a little over halfway through it. I wish I had bought two to keep for storage later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and Effective
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for many years. It is gentle but does a thorough job of cleaning delicate areas without causing any itching or discomfort. I highly recommend it especially for those of us who are "older" and have a problem with vaginal dryness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for older women with pessary

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: happy to use this product, good for senstive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2014
reviews.reviewText: This is Leo's sweetie. I've been using this cleanser for a few years. It is gentle and keeps me feeling fresh and clean without harsh solvents or stupid girly scents (I make my own, thanks). I've tried other cleansers for the same purpose and this is the best.I put mine into a pump that makes foam, which when you add the water, makes this product last longer. Since it is a little pricey, it makes good sense.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product incredible - Amazon delivery dreadful
reviews.reviewText: The product does exactly what it should and what the research said it would do, so kudos to the product! But I'll be buying it through the manufacturer from now on. Amazon delivered it to the wrong house (sent me a picture of the house, so it's documented). I'll avoid Amazon delivery next time I order this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Products came covered in brown/red stuff
reviews.reviewText: The health products arrived on time but it was alarming to see them covered in a gross reddish brown substance. The boxes were dirty. I will not be able to use them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Product - Disappointed With Ingredient
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful cleanser and I was very happy with it until I realized it has phenoxyethanol. I urge you to read ingredients of any self care product carefully. Through my research I have found that "paraben free" or "natural" and even "organic" products can sometimes use questionable ingredients. For that reason I gave it a four star instead of five.
A little goes a long way. Really helped keep my feminine area clear and fresh. Will likely buy again. Thought the price was a bit steep especially for this small product.
